review: At the end scene, I may have cried buckets... my jaw hanging agape in shock. In my 28+ years of gaming this has to be one of the best plots I've come across in a game. Which I was not expecting, especially in a FPS.
if you don't have this game, I question your ablity to play them, or own a computer.
So much fun if you are interested in the medieval era. Load of fun. Just watch your personal life as I have dropped almost 60 hours on this.
